垱字的基本解释

垱
（壋）
dàng
为便于灌溉而筑的小土堤：筑垱挖塘。
常用为与当地所筑堤坝有关的地名：舒家垱。

垱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàng］
“垱1”的繁体字。
(1)方言。为便于灌溉而筑的小土堤。
(2)用为与当地所筑堤堰有关的地名。江西省南昌县嵩安乡有舒家壋，丰城县剑江西有绳湾壋，又县西七十里滨瑞河有滕坊壋，都是堤堰之属。见清《嘉庆一统志·江西·南昌府二》。

垱字的起名意思

Dang
Basic explanation of words
Dang
(壋)
dàng
A small earth embankment built to facilitate irrigation: build a pond and dig a pond.
Commonly used as the place name related to the local embankment: Shujiadang.
Dang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàng］
"垱1" in traditional characters.
(1) Dialects. A small earth embankment built to facilitate irrigation.
(2) It is used as the place name related to the local dike. In Songan Township, Nanchang County, Jiangxi Province, there is Shujiadeng, Jianjiang West in Fengcheng County has Shengwan Deng, and West Qishili Binrui River has Tengfang Deng, all of which belong to the dike. See Qing "Jiaqing Yitongzhi·Jiangxi·Nanchang Mansion Two".
